abilities.name: Putrid Cloud
abilities.description: On Death: 2d6 poison damage to enemies within Reach 2.

abilities.name: Revenge
abilities.description: When an ally dies, you may move up to 6 spaces before using your Nooooo! ability.

actions.name: Oblation of Blood!
actions.description: If undamaged, attack self for 2 damage. Adjacent enemies are inflicted with Despair.

abilities.name: Caustic Eruption
abilities.description: On death: 4d6 acid damage to all adjacent creatures.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Advantage against Bloodied creatures.

abilities.name: Savage
abilities.description: Always crits when attacking a Grappled creature.

abilities.name: CLANG!
abilities.description: Allies who hear your clanging, roll 1 additional die whenever they attack.

abilities.name: Trap!
abilities.description: When an enemy moves adjacent to you or an ally, they trigger one of your traps! (1/encounter each). BEEES! Deal 5d4 damage (doesn't miss). Half as much to ALL adjacent creatures. HIDDEN NET! Restrained (escape DC 10).

abilities.name: Hold!
abilities.description: Adjacent allies gain Medium Armor.

abilities.name: Sneak
abilities.description: You are invisible until you attack.

actions.name: Tangle (2×)
actions.description: (Reach 6) On Hit: Grappled (escape DC 12, or any fire or slashing damage).

abilities.name: Meat Shield
abilities.description: Can force other goblins to Interpose for him.

actions.name: Get in here!
actions.description: Call a goblin minion to the fight.

abilities.name: CHAAARGE!
abilities.description: If you move at least 4 spaces in a straight line, attack with advantage once.

abilities.name: On Death
abilities.description: Deal 1d12 damage back (ignores metal armor).

actions.name: Shoot Web
actions.description: On hit: Restrained (escape DC 12, or any slashing/fire damage).

actions.name: Oblation of Blood!
actions.description: If undamaged, attack self for 2 damage. Adjacent enemies are inflicted with Despair.

actions.name: Whispers of Madness
actions.description: Contested STR check or Grappled (reroll to escape, or any radiant damage); if successful, deal psychic damage (cannot be Defended or Interposed against).

abilities.name: Spark Step
abilities.description: When damaged, teleport up to 4 spaces.

actions.name: Arc Lightning
actions.description: Also strikes the next closest creature. On miss: damage self instead.

abilities.name: Spines
abilities.description: Melee attackers take 3 damage.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.description: Advantage against Bloodied creatures.

actions.name: Fly & Drop
actions.description: (if grappling) Fly upward 12 and release (6d6 fall damage).

actions.name: Web Garrote
actions.description: On hit: Grappled (escape DC 13), Silenced until target escapes. (Silenced: Cannot cast spells or use other abilities that require speaking.)

actions.name: Feverish Chant
actions.description: (Concentration) Reduce all damage done to allies who can hear you to 1.

actions.name: Ecstatic Ravings
actions.description: Psychic damage to all enemies who can hear you.

attributes.name: Medium Mimic
attributes.description: (Table, Treasure Chest, Barrel, Bookshelf, Door, Bed)

abilities.name: Illusory Aura
abilities.description: Attacks against the Duskprowler have Disadvantage 2. Damage suppresses this effect until the end of the next hero's turn.

actions.name: Shoot Web
actions.description: On hit: Restrained (escape DC 12, or any slashing/fire damage).

abilities.name: Flesh to Stone
abilities.description: Creatures Dazed by the Basilisk remain so for 10 minutes. Dazed 3 times = Petrified.

actions.name: Beastshift
actions.description: +4 speed, gain Medium armor this round.

actions.name: Hurricane
actions.description: (Reach 3) To all enemies within reach. On damage: move targets anywhere else in Reach.

actions.name: Decaying Swipe (2×)
actions.description: On damage: knockback Primary Die spaces.

abilities.name: Burst Forth!
abilities.description: Combat with a Bulette starts with the heaviest character making a DC 14 DEX save or they are Grappled (escape DC 14) and take 1d12+20 damage (half on save).

actions.name: Drag Below
actions.description: (A Grappled creature) Then drag below and burrow away.

actions.name: Leap & Bite
actions.description: (If not grappling) Leap 6, and attack. On hit: Grappled.

abilities.name: Regenerate
abilities.description: Does not die at 0 HP. Only fire, radiant, or a crit while at 0 HP can kill it.

abilities.name: Confounding Pheromones
abilities.description: Enemies make a DC 15 WIL save at the start of their turns or Confused this turn. Gain advantage 1 on the save for each failure this encounter. (Confused: The GM spends your next action.)

abilities.name: Brute
abilities.description: On hit: Knockback Primary Die spaces.

abilities.name: Ambusher
abilities.description: Cloakers always start first and heroes roll Initiative with disadvantage.

abilities.name: Mutual Harm
abilities.description: You take half damage from attacks while grappling a creature (they take the other half).

actions.name: Horrifying Wail
actions.description: DC 16 WIL save, or creatures within 6 spaces are Frightened and must spend 1 Action moving as far away as possible.

actions.name: Doomclaw (2×)
actions.description: (Reach 2) On damage: Grappled (escape DC 17). If the same creature is Grappled by both of the glabrezu's claws, it must escape from each of them separately.

actions.name: Tear Asunder
actions.description: (A creature Grappled by both of the glabrezu's claws) Unpreventable damage. If the target is at 0 HP: DC 17 STR save or be torn in two, dying instantly.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Attack with advantage when unarmored.

abilities.name: Tremor Sight
abilities.description: Advantage against creatures that moved since the worm's last turn.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Creatures in a 2×6 area take damage on a failed DC 18 DEX save. (Creatures who fail can spend 1 Action to dive out of the way instead of taking this damage. They move half their speed and land Prone.)

actions.name: Bite/Swallow
actions.description: On crit: Swallowed. (Swallowed: You take 20 damage at the start of your turn. Your attacks cannot miss and ignore armor.)

actions.name: Pluck Up
actions.description: (Reach 4, target up to 2 creatures) On hit: Grappled (escape DC 18).

actions.name: Crush & Drop
actions.description: Fly upward 20 spaces, deal damage to Grappled creatures, then release (10d6 fall damage).

abilities.name: Cursed Gaze
abilities.description: When crit: DC 20 INT save, or suffer 1 Wound.

actions.name: Scarab Swarm
actions.description: Summon 10 scarab minions (d6) within 6 spaces. Then:

attributes.name: Alaric Draegoth, the Crimson Count

abilities.name: Sanguine Cloak
abilities.description: (1/turn) Deal 1d10 necrotic damage whenever you are hit, the attack is reduced by this amount.

abilities.name: Sunscorn
abilities.description: Vulnerable to radiant. After taking radiant damage, use Beguile as a Reaction, they roll with disadvantage.

actions.name: Ebonfang
actions.description: Your target is considered Bloodied for 1 round. Fly 8 before or after attacking.

actions.name: Beguile
actions.description: If no creature is Beguiled, Beguile a target on a failed DC 18 WIL save (w/ disadvantage if Bloodied). Beguiled: Dazed. Cannot Defend or allow anyone to Interpose for you. Damage ends.

actions.name: Beckon & Bite
actions.description: Move a Beguiled creature adjacent to you and bite them. Also deals 1 Wound.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, summon 1 blood bat minion (d10) within 8 spaces, then choose 1:
attributes.bloodied: At 160 HP, gain Mistform. Not vulnerable to radiant. Bat Decoy: Whenever Alaric would take damage, instead first swap places with a bat minion, 1/round.
attributes.lastStand: Alaric is dying! 160 more damage and he dies. Until then, his Sanguine Cloak, attacks, and bats roll d20s instead of d10s.

attributes.name: Azriel, Lord of Pain & Flame

abilities.name: PAIN!
abilities.description: Crits against Azriel are Vicious, he deals damage equal to the crit dice back to the attacker.

actions.name: Crackling Whip
actions.description: Move 6. (Reach 6) On hit: Grappled and pulled adjacent to Azriel (escape DC 17 STR, DEX, or until he uses the whip again).

actions.name: Doom Sword
actions.description: Fire damage to all creatures within Reach 2.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 160 HP, Azriel can use Crackling Whip twice each turn.
attributes.lastStand: YES, MORE PAIN! Azriel is dying! 180 more damage and he dies. Until then, EVERY hit against him is a crit.

attributes.name: Dravok, All-Seeing Tyrant

abilities.name: My plans, flawless!
abilities.description: Dravok makes all saves with +1 Advantage, attacks against him have Disadvantage.

abilities.name: Weakness
abilities.description: Taking more than 12 piercing or slashing damage: Dravok's plans are FLAWED! (until the end of the next hero's turn.)

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.description: (Range 10) Randomly chosen ray then choose target: 1. Warping Ray: 3d6, On hit: Dazed, exchange places. 2. Petrification Ray: Permanently Dazed, healing ends (3 stacks = Petrified). 3. Terror Ray: 5d10 psychic & Terrified. 4. Gravitation Ray: 2d6, push that many spaces, Prone on 7+. 5. Charm Ray: DC 16 WIL or spend 3 Actions controlled. 6. Death Ray: DC 16 STR or drop to 0 HP.

actions.name: Terrible Maw
actions.description: Melee attack. EVERY die can crit and is Vicious.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, Move 6 and then either use Eye Ray OR Terrible Maw:
attributes.bloodied: To Dust! At 110 HP, use Petrification Ray against every enemy. His save DC increases to 18.
attributes.lastStand: Dravok is dying! 70 more damage and he dies. Until then, each turn he will move or use Warping Ray and then Devastation Beam: 2d12+20 in a 10 space long, 2 space wide line.

attributes.name: Florindris, Bane of the Forest

abilities.name: Aura of Wind
abilities.description: Ranged attacks against you have disadvantage. End of turn: push adjacent creatures 2 spaces away.

abilities.name: Wither
abilities.description: Resistant to necrotic damage, but it suppresses Aura of Wind for 1 turn.

actions.name: Petal Storm
actions.description: (1 use) Damage to all enemies within Reach 8, half on a DC 13 DEX save.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Fly 10 before or after attacking. (Reach 2) Up to 2 targets within reach. On hit: Gain Thornblight (suffer 5 damage for each space forcibly moved, magical healing ends).

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 100 HP, enemies within Reach 12 gain Thornblight, and Petal Storm recharges.
attributes.lastStand: Florindris is dying! 70 more damage and she dies. Until then, Aura of Wind and Gust move creatures twice as far.

attributes.name: General Flameheart

abilities.name: Cinder Armor
abilities.description: Immune to fire. When damaged, deal 5 fire damage to all adjacent creatures.

abilities.name: Extinguish Flame
abilities.description: Cold or radiant crits extinguish all areas ignited by Molten Fury and suppress Cinder Armor for 1 turn.

actions.name: Inferno Cleave
actions.description: Move 8 then strike a 2×2 square area for fire damage.

actions.name: Molten Fury
actions.description: Lob a molten fireball at the furthest hero not already in the flames, igniting a 2×2 square area. Another 10 damage at the end of each of their turns if they remain in the area.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 87 HP, on his next turn, he uses Molten Fury a number of times equal to half the number of heroes (rounded up).
attributes.lastStand: Flameheart is dying! 80 more damage and he dies. Until then, the area of his attacks increase to a 3×3 square.

attributes.name: Gloomwing the Cruel

abilities.name: Aura of Rot
abilities.description: Creatures within 6 spaces take 5 necrotic damage at the end of their turns.

abilities.name: Light Sensitivity
abilities.description: Radiant damage suppresses Aura of Rot until the end of the next hero's turn.

actions.name: Rot Breath
actions.description: (1 use) Fly 10, then (Cone 8) DC 17 DEX save or necrotic damage, half on save.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: (Reach 2) Move 6. On damage: Cruelty's Gift (Healing is halved and Vulnerable to necrotic, healing ends).

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 160 HP Gloomwing's Rot Breath recharges.
attributes.lastStand: Gloomwing is dying! 150 more damage and he dies. Until then, the damage and range of His Aura of Rot is doubled.

attributes.name: Grimbeak, the Unyielding

abilities.name: Brutal
abilities.description: Treat the highest die rolled as the Primary Die. On crit: knock Prone.

actions.name: Savage Screech
actions.description: (1 use) All enemies within reach 12 suffer damage (ignoring armor). DC 11 WIL save or become Frightened for 1 round.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.lastStand: Grimbeak is dying! 30 more damage and she dies. Until then, her Attacks use d10s instead of d6s.

attributes.name: Nalzar, Apex Predator

abilities.name: Tail Swipe
abilities.description: When dealt slashing or lightning damage: knock a hero within 3 spaces Prone.

abilities.name: Torn Wings
abilities.description: Each slashing crit reduces the Wing Buffet DC by 1.

actions.name: Wing Buffet
actions.description: Fly 8, then land. Cone 8: then DC 14 STR save or also knocked Prone (advantage if behind cover or another hero).

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 90 HP, her Wing Buffet Range and DC increase by 2.
attributes.lastStand: Nalzar is dying! 60 more damage and she dies. Until then, each turn, she moves 6, then uses Devour (ignoring the Prone requirement).

attributes.name: Pudge the Blunderer

actions.name: Grab & Throw
actions.description: On damage: they are thrown at another hero within 6 spaces. Both make a DC 12 DEX save or take 1d8+2 damage and are knocked Prone, half damage on save.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 37 HP, Pudge's damage increases to 1d12+2.
attributes.lastStand: Pudge is dying! 20 more damage and he dies. Until then, Pudge can move 6 spaces, and use Grab & Throw each turn.

attributes.name: Queen Aranya, Broodmother

abilities.name: Weave Web
abilities.description: Creatures she hits are entangled in a sticky web (Dazed).

abilities.name: Flammable Webs
abilities.description: Fire critical hits suppress the Broodmother's Weave Web for 1 turn.

actions.name: Impale
actions.description: (Reach 2) Then skitter away up to 8 spaces.

actions.name: Hatch Brood
actions.description: Summon spiderling minions (1/hero, size: d8); they act only when commanded.

actions.name: Dinner Time!
actions.description: Command all of your spiderling minions to move up to 6 spaces and attack once each.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: "Avenge Your Queen, My Brood!" At 80 HP, summon 3 spiderling minions/hero anywhere within Reach 8.
attributes.lastStand: Aranya is dying! 40 more damage and she dies. Until then, Hatch Brood after each of her turns.

attributes.name: Ravager of the Lowlands

abilities.name: Feral Instinct
abilities.description: Whenever Ravager is crit, he can fly 10.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 65 HP, his Venomous Stinger recharges.
attributes.lastStand: The Ravager is dying! 40 more damage and he dies. Until then, the first time each turn he takes damage, he uses Move & Claw.

attributes.name: Caerys, the Hollow Star

abilities.name: Ravages of Time
abilities.description: At the beginning of each round, all heroes suffer 1 Wound.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: 3/encounter when she would suffer any negative effect she can swap places with a creature of her choice making them the target instead. All heroes recover 1 Wound.

actions.name: Wormhole
actions.description: Teleport 12. Damage to a creature adjacent to where you began or ended.

actions.name: Immensity
actions.description: (Reach 12) DC 20 STR save (disadvantage if within Reach 4) or damage and Prone. Half on save.

actions.name: Glimpse Your End
actions.description: DC 20 WIL save or DOOMED: Concentration ends, the next damage roll against you is maximized.

actions.name: Plasma Storm
actions.description: Reach 6, DC 20 DEX save or lightning and fire damage. Half on save.

actions.name: Almighty Push & Pull
actions.description: (Range 12) DC 20 STR save or be launched 20 ft. into the air, repeat until the target saves. Fall damage for this attack is 1d20 for every 10 ft. fallen.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose 1 not yet chosen (reset when all have been chosen):
attributes.bloodied: At 310 HP, Gravitational Mastery: Move ALL objects and creatures within 16 spaces anywhere else within the area. Gravitational Lensing: The hero with the most HP is marked by Caerys. She takes half damage from all sources, her mark takes the other half. This lasts until the mark drops to 0 HP.
attributes.lastStand: Use Gravitational Mastery, then Caerys is dying! 200 more damage and she dies. Until then she chooses twice each turn. If still alive after 1 round: Reset Time: she resets back to full HP.

attributes.name: Thorn Quickblade

abilities.name: Strike Back
abilities.description: When crit, make a Heart Piercer or Stormquill attack in return.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: Smoke Bomb. At 62 HP, Thorn immediately becomes invisible (until the end of his next turn), then moves 8, ignoring opportunity attacks.
attributes.lastStand: Mortal Panic! Thorn is dying! 30 more damage and he's dead! Until then he'll Strike Back EVERY time he's hit (1/turn).

attributes.name: Titan of the Deep Woods

abilities.name: Splintering Legions
abilities.description: Bludgeoning damage or any crit cause bones to splinter off and animate, forming a d10 minion.

abilities.name: Brittle Bones
abilities.description: Resistant to piercing, vulnerable to bludgeoning.

actions.name: Crushing Stomp
actions.description: Move up to 10 spaces. Up to 2 targets along the path. On hit: Prone.

actions.name: Beckoning Doom
actions.description: The 2 furthest heroes make a DC 16 STR save or are moved adjacent to Titan.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.lastStand: Shattered Legion. At 0 HP Titan collapses into 4 skeleton minions/hero (d10 sized). If any remain, they reassemble into the Titan the next evening.

attributes.name: Ul'vek, Psionic Despot

abilities.name: Mind Shield
abilities.description: Whenever Ul' would fail a save or take more than 30 damage while he has a creature Dominated, he may avoid the attack instead, but all Dominated creatures come to their senses.

actions.name: Dominate
actions.description: (If no creatures are Dominated) Choose half of the heroes to suffer psychic damage (ignoring armor). DC 15 WIL save or Dominated as well. Dominated: Rolls are made with disadvantage. Ul' spends your first action on each of your turns. Damage ends.

actions.name: Consume
actions.description: (Dominated creature) Contested DEX or STR check, on success: Grappled. Cannot be Defended or Interposed against.

actions.name: Control
actions.description: Teleport 8. (Reach 8) DC 15 WIL save, force an enemy to spend one Action to make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip. On save, they attack with disadvantage.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, choose one:
attributes.bloodied: At 150 HP gain Illusory Shift. Reaction, when attacked (1 use): Swap places with a Dominated creature, making them the new target of the attack.
attributes.lastStand: Ul' is dying! 110 more damage and he dies. Until then, Dominated no longer ends on taking damage. Every hero makes a WIL save or become Dominated.

attributes.name: Vael, Undying Necromancer

abilities.name: Protect Master!
abilities.description: Whenever Vael would fail a save or take 20 or more damage, he may sacrifice his Lifebinding Spirit, Bane, instead. He spends his next turn moving up to 6 spaces and summoning Bane.

actions.name: DOOM
actions.description: (Undamaged target) DC 14 WIL save or full damage. Half on save.

actions.name: Veilwalker's Rebuke
actions.description: Double damage against those behind cover. 1/round you may swap places with them.

actions.name: Cruelty's Edge
actions.description: On hit: DC 14 WIL save or Dazed and Frightened. Then move 6.

attributes.actionsInstructions: After each hero's turn, Bane attacks for 1d12+6 then Vael chooses one:
attributes.bloodied: At 125 HP, Vael gains the reaction Shield of Cruelty. (1 time use) If Vael would be damaged, instead he may reflect that much radiant damage back at the attacker.
attributes.lastStand: DEATH, AN OLD FRIEND. Vael is dying! 90 more damage and he dies. Until then, he gains Heavy Armor, the hero that most recently damaged him is reduced to 0 HP, and Bane is sacrificed into a Vengeful Spirit. It deals 1d12+6 necrotic damage to creatures within reach 3 at the end of each of his turns.

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.description: Treat attacks against you that roll 2 as a miss.

attributes.name: Briarbanes
attributes.description: Soulless, thorny plant beings fertilized by blood.

abilities.name: Peeling Bark
abilities.description: Damage degrades Armor 1 step: Heavy » Medium » None.

abilities.name: Fanatical Zeal
abilities.description: While not at max HP, make all rolls with advantage. Your crits also inflict Despair (Disadvantage on the next attack you make this encounter).

attributes.name: Goblins
attributes.description: Green, cunning, & thriving on the edge of chaos. Will mock you mercilessly if given the chance.

abilities.name: Haha, Missed Me!
abilities.description: Whenever an attack misses you, deal 1 psychic damage in return.

attributes.name: Kobolds
attributes.description: Small, maniacal dragonlings. Fiercely protective of their own.

abilities.name: Nooooo!
abilities.description: When an ally within 2 spaces dies, attack once for free.

abilities.name: Ambusher
abilities.description: Mimics always start first and heroes roll Initiative with disadvantage.

abilities.name: Sticky
abilities.description: Mimic hits also Grapple and can Grapple any number of creatures. When crit: release 1 creature (attacker's choice).

abilities.name: Digestive Touch
abilities.description: Contact with an ooze inflicts the Digested condition: they deal an additional X damage for each time the target has been Digested this encounter.

abilities.name: Goopy
abilities.description: When crit or dealt any slashing damage: summon X ooze minions (size: d6); their attacks inflict Digested.

abilities.name: Coiling Strike
abilities.description: On melee crit: Grapple (escape DC 10).

abilities.name: Evasive Flier
abilities.description: Attacks against stirges are made with disadvantage.

abilities.name: Latched On
abilities.description: You move where your target moves until either dies. Your attacks can't miss or be Defended/Interposed against. Attacks that miss you damage your target instead.

attributes.name: Undead
attributes.description: Hate the living for not being dead, hate themselves for not being living.

abilities.name: Unliving, Undying
abilities.description: The first time this dies, reset to 1 HP instead (excluding minions).
